actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to adjust the formula for determining the Federal percentage with respect to benefits paid by a State plan approved under part A of title IV, to adjust the formula for determining the Federal percentage with respect to benefits paid by a State plan approved under title XIX, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends titles IV, part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children), XI, part A (General Provisions), and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to revise the Federal matching rates under the AFDC and Medicaid programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to adjust the formula for determining the Federal percentage with respect to benefits paid by a State plan approved under part A of title IV, to adjust the formula for determining the Federal percentage with respect to benefits paid by a State plan approved under title XIX, and for other purposes.
